p: From 2008 to 2015, we collected 1392 brain tissue samples. These samples were obtained from 252 dogs suspected of having rabies, 1129 apparently healthy domestic dogs, 2 cows, and 9 human patients within 24 hours of death in 14 prefectures and 43 counties of Yunnan Province ( Fig 1B). In addition, 18 saliva samples and 1 cerebrospinal fluid sample were obtained from surviving patients.
